data.title: Manish Malhotra designs Jennifer Lopez's Bridgerton theme birthday party outfit, says, "40 artists took 3490 hours to craft it"
data.meta_description: In the realm of high fashion, few names resonate with the same level of reverence as Manish Malhotra. His latest collaboration with global icon Jennifer Lopez has set the fashion world abuzz. Malhotra, a designer known for his intricate designs and opulent aesthetic, has designed a stunning Bridgerton-inspired birthday dress for Lopez, featuring over a million crystals.
